scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: MoonChild Ceres
scrape.text: I honestly had to stop reading this half way through. It took way to long for the plot to thicken. It rambled on about random things that didn't seem very important to the story and I just don't have the patience. I look forward to the movie though. ( Which is the only reason I picjed up this book in the first place.)
